text: Podar World School is a group of schools headquartered in Mumbai. The schools lay a special emphasis on technology and innovative educational teaching methods. The group is led by Raghav Podar. The schools also consist of a preschool with the name of Podar Jumbo Kids. == Locations == The schools are located in the following cities: * Maharashtra * Nagpur * Gujarat * Sherkhi – Vadodara * Sama – Vadodara * Maneja – Vadodara * Vapi * Ankleshwar * Rajasthan * Jaipur == References == == External links == * Category:Central Board of Secondary Education Category:Schools in Vadodara Category:Schools in Jaipur
title: Podar World School
